page.description: Specify when Alpha Anywhere should calculate the pre-rendered UX Component.

discussion.p: The UX Component can be pre-rendered before publushing. By default, the calculation is performed every time the UX Component is saved. In a large component, computing the pre-rendered component can be slow, so you may not want to compute the pre-rendered component every time your save the component.

If you do not want to compute the pre-rendered component on every save, you can change the behavior to *[ui:Promt when component is saved]*. The behavior options for *[ui:When to compute pre-rendered component]* are listed below:

item.name: Every time component is saved
item.description: Compute the pre-rendered UX Component every time the component is saved.

item.name: Prompt when component is saved
item.description: Prompt when the UX Ccomponent is saved to compute the pre-rendered component.
